name: JoinPublic
tag_list: local-based, social-media, application, mobile, gps, demand-supply, local-agenda, local-sharing, twitter, facebook, instagram, youtube, google-
overview:
JoinPublic is Local based iPhone application with 3 simple functions. At JoinPublic users can buy, sell or post a request with direct contact through the chat function & JoinPublic also matches user’s items with keywords.

Users can share photo’s, video’s, text messages and Tweets with their 10 kilo area. The shared items will also be posted on their linked platforms “Facebook, Twitter and YouTube” so users can share with their friends and locals at the same time.

Users can create or see which events are in their 10 km area.

This means: one free app that connects you to your whole local community so you can create experiences and explore.
